dmca.title: Consumer Reports to Website: Don't Quote us On That
dmca.body:
Consumers Union is a nonprofit organization that does not permit commercial use of the its name or content.  We do not grant permission for your to reference, quote, post comments from our articles on insurance as a way to speak poorly about one of the products or services we have rated.  We therefore ask that you remove all quotes from and indirect references to Consumer Reports(R)from your site.  Consumers perceive this to be an endorsement of your site.


thank you.
[private]
manager, legal services
Consumers Union, the nonprofit publisher of
Consumer Reports(R) and ConsumerReports.org(R)
[private]@consumer.org
dmca.principal_name: Consumers Union, the nonprofit publisher of Consumer Reports(R)
